description: WE ARE REPOSTING THIS SHOOT AS A MIDWEEK UPDATE. A NEW UPDATE WILL BE POSTED ON FRIDAY AS USUAL. Penny Pax does an amazing performance in this feature update also starring Tommy Pistol! Penny is an enthusiast of extreme rough bondage sex and taboo role-play. In this fantasy storyline, Penny plays a wholesome girl who meets a troubled man in the waiting room at her therapists office. She attempts to befriend him by showing up at the auto body shop where he works. Tommy breaks innocent little Penny down into a filthy slut, ruthlessly fucking all of her holes right there at the shop! She is completely overwhelmed by his wrath but is joyfully liberated from her previously repressed sex life.
title: Best of SAS: A Helping Whore
